sentence: The image is an infographic titled "STATSHOT," focusing on workforce inspiration.
sentence_cn: 该图是一张名为“STATSHOT”的信息图，重点关注劳动力激励。

sentence: It states that only half of the workforce feels inspired, with the main text in large green letters reading "ONLY HALF OF THE WORKFORCE FEELS INSPIRED."
sentence_cn: 报告指出，只有一半的劳动力感到受到启发，正文用大绿色字母写着“只有一半的劳动力感到受到启发”。
words: ONLY HALF OF THE WORKFORCE FEELS INSPIRED.

sentence: There's a smaller text box stating: "Only 49% feel their current manager inspires them to do their best work."
sentence_cn: 有一个较小的文本框，上面写着：“只有 49% 的人认为他们现在的经理激励他们尽最大努力工作。”
words: Only 49% feel their current manager inspires them to do their best work.

sentence: The visual includes six light bulb icons, with the top three in green (illuminated) and the bottom three in white (not illuminated), representing the 49% to 51% split.
sentence_cn: 视觉效果包括六个灯泡图标，其中顶部三个为绿色（发光），底部三个为白色（不发光），代表 49% 和 51% 的比例。

sentence: At the bottom, there's a statement: "We surveyed nearly 170,000 people from 30 countries about their attitudes toward leadership in the workplace.
sentence_cn: 在报告的最下方，有这样一句话：“我们调查了来自30个国家的近17万人对职场领导的态度。

sentence: The background is primarily dark gray, and the logo "KELLY" is positioned in the bottom right corner.
sentence_cn: 背景主要以深灰色为主，标志“KELLY”位于右下角。
